org.esupportail.commons.beans
Class AbstractI18nAwareBean

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.beans.AbstractI18nAwareBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractApplicationAwareBean, AbstractDeepLinkingRedirector
public abstract class AbstractI18nAwareBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, java.io.Serializable

An abstract class inherited by all the beans for them to gain i18n features.

See Also:
Serialized Form
